roleset.name: move like a snake, be snake-shaped

example.name: the one example
example.text: A squiggly line snakes across a video screen, *trace* gyrating erratically as subjects with hand-held computers register their second-by-second reactions to a speaker's remarks.
example.arg: *trace* gyrating erratically as subjects with hand-held computers register their second-by-second reactions to a speaker's remarks

roleset.note: Based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls meander-47.7, roll-51.3.1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.
